meta.title: MeiliSearch
meta.description: An open source, blazingly fast and hyper relevant search-engine that will improve your search experience

hero.title: Shape a delightful search experience in a snap
hero.description: An open source, lightning fast, and hyper relevant search-engine that fits effortlessly into your apps, websites, and workflow.

demo.title: The next generation of search
demo.description: Meilisearch is a flexible, powerful, user-focused search engine that can be added to any website or application. It aims to save users time and improve product experience.

keypoints.title: Lightning fast
keypoints.description: Search-as-you-type returns answers in less than 50 milliseconds. That's faster than the blink of an eye!

keypoints.title: Plug ‘n play
keypoints.description: Deploy in a matter of minutes. Smart presets let you start searching through your data with zero configuration.

keypoints.title: Flexible
keypoints.description: Send data to MeiliSearch however you want—no need to match a schema or transform your data into a compatible format.

keypoints.title: Typo tolerant
keypoints.description: Everyone makes mistakes! If typos break your search experience, many users will leave thinking what they were looking for just wasn't there.

openSource.title: Nothing good is built alone
openSource.description: Join the MeiliSquad, our fast growing community.

steps.title: Connect
steps.description: In less than 5 minutes, your data is ready to be searched. Connect your codebase to Meilisearch with our official libraries.

steps.title: Customize
steps.description: Meilisearch is designed to work out of the box. But because every project is different, you can customize it in just a few minutes to make any searches enjoyable.

cards.title: Filters
cards.description: Enhance your user's search by adding custom filters and build a faceted search in a few lines of code.

cards.title: Geo search
cards.description: Search in the real world. No need for a PhD, we've got you covered.

cards.title: Language detection
cards.description: MeiliSearch supports all languages and is able to detect them automatically.

cards.title: Sort by
cards.description: Sort your result based on price, date, or whatever you have in mind.

cards.title: Custom relevancy
cards.description: Let's break the rules. Play with our main rules or create your own.

cards.title: API Keys
cards.description: Secure your data by managing API keys with dedicated access and permissions.
